00010 public:

00014         {

00024 struct MyCallback : public btTriangleRaycastCallback
00025                 {
00026                         int     m_ignorePart;
00027                         int     m_ignoreTriangleIndex;
00028                         
00029 
00030                         MyCallback(const btVector3& from, const btVector3& to, int ignorePart, int ignoreTriangleIndex)
00031                         :btTriangleRaycastCallback(from,to),
00032                         m_ignorePart(ignorePart),
00033                         m_ignoreTriangleIndex(ignoreTriangleIndex)
00034                         {
00035                                 
00036                         }
00037                         virtual btScalar reportHit(const btVector3& hitNormalLocal, btScalar hitFraction, int partId, int triangleIndex)
00038                         {
00039                                 if (partId!=m_ignorePart || triangleIndex!=m_ignoreTriangleIndex)
00040                                 {
00041                                         if (hitFraction < m_hitFraction)
00042                                                 return hitFraction;
00043                                 }
00044 
00045                                 return m_hitFraction;
00046                         }
00047                 };
00048                 struct MyInternalTriangleIndexCallback :public btInternalTriangleIndexCallback
00049                 {
00050                         const btGImpactMeshShape*               m_gimpactShape;
00051                         btCompoundShape*                        m_colShape;
00052                         btScalar        m_depth;
00053 
00054                         MyInternalTriangleIndexCallback (btCompoundShape* colShape, const btGImpactMeshShape* meshShape, btScalar depth)
00055                         :m_colShape(colShape),
00056                         m_gimpactShape(meshShape),
00057                         m_depth(depth)
00058                         {
00059                         }
00060                         
00061                         virtual void internalProcessTriangleIndex(btVector3* triangle,int partId,int  triangleIndex)
00062                         {
00063                                 btVector3 scale = m_gimpactShape->getLocalScaling();
00064                                 btVector3 v0=triangle[0]*scale;
00065                                 btVector3 v1=triangle[1]*scale;
00066                                 btVector3 v2=triangle[2]*scale;
00067                                 
00068                                 btVector3 centroid = (v0+v1+v2)/3;
00069                                 btVector3 normal = (v1-v0).cross(v2-v0);
00070                                 normal.normalize();
00071                                 btVector3 rayFrom = centroid;
00072                                 btVector3 rayTo = centroid-normal*m_depth;
00073                                 
00074                                 MyCallback cb(rayFrom,rayTo,partId,triangleIndex);
00075                                 
00076                                 m_gimpactShape->processAllTrianglesRay(&cb,rayFrom, rayTo);
00077                                 if (cb.m_hitFraction<1)
00078                                 {
00079                                         rayTo.setInterpolate3(cb.m_from,cb.m_to,cb.m_hitFraction);
00080                                         //rayTo = cb.m_from;
00081                                         //rayTo = rayTo.lerp(cb.m_to,cb.m_hitFraction);
00082                                         //gDebugDraw.drawLine(tr(centroid),tr(centroid+normal),btVector3(1,0,0));
00083                                 }
00084                                 
00085 
00086                                 
00087                                 btBU_Simplex1to4* tet = new btBU_Simplex1to4(v0,v1,v2,rayTo);
00088                                 btTransform ident;
00089                                 ident.setIdentity();
00090                                 m_colShape->addChildShape(ident,tet);
00091                         }
00092                 };
00093                 
00094 btCompoundShape*        btCreateCompoundFromGimpactShape(const btGImpactMeshShape* gimpactMesh, btScalar depth)
00095 {
00096         btCompoundShape* colShape = new btCompoundFromGimpactShape();
00097                 
00098                 btTransform tr;
00099                 tr.setIdentity();
00100                 
00101                 MyInternalTriangleIndexCallback cb(colShape,gimpactMesh, depth);
00102                 btVector3 aabbMin,aabbMax;
00103                 gimpactMesh->getAabb(tr,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00104                 gimpactMesh->getMeshInterface()->InternalProcessAllTriangles(&cb,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00105 
00106         return colShape;        
00107 }
